prompts: Create a cute evolution of Eevee that can harness the powers of the wind.
Design a water-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and fluffy fur.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles Eevee but has vibrant colors and mythical abilities.
Show me an evolution of Eevee that thrives in urban environments and has tech-like features.
Make a Pokemon based on Eevee but with dragon-like scales and wings.
Generate a forest-themed Pokemon that has Eevee's base shape but with glowing patterns.
Give me a unique take on Eevee that incorporates elements of both fire and ice.
